archimate:Node.name: [L1 Base] OCS Driven Batch Compute Capability (Logical Node)
archimate:Node.documentation: This amount of compute needed to submit, monotr and renevouew with batch submistion made to batch system. Jobs flow though this system and do not run on this syste,, nopr are thier inputs of output stored in this system in a permenant way. The OSC drive bath supports only knowledge of outstanding batch jobs.
